title: TFR Ep. 539: Sundance 2021 Review, Top 10 of 2020 (5-1)
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt, clearly flush with cash, buy their way into the Sundance Film Festival!  Chris and Matt settle in to the great white, West (?) and checked out ‘Censor’, ‘Eight For Silver’, and ‘Prisoners Of The Ghostland’.  But the fun doesn’t stop there!  Matt also saw ‘John And the Hole’, ‘In the Earth’, ‘Wild Indian’, ‘Strawberry Mansion’, ‘First Date’, and ‘The Blazing World’.  Wow.  There’s the truly wonderful and extensive rundown of the big releases on home video, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  And if that’s not enough, Matt and Chris close out there 10 Favorite Films Of 2020, featuring picks 5-1.

00:00-08:29: Intro/Censor

08:30-13:46: Eight For Silver

13:47-22:06: Prisoners of Ghostland

22:07-29:42: Physical Media Picks

29:43-31:58: First Date

31:59-34:40: John And The Hole

34:41-37:27: In The Earth

37:28-40:00: Strawberry Mansion

40:01-43:13: Wild Indian

43:14-46:23: The Blazing World

46:24-01:04:10: 10 Favorite Films Of 2020 (5-1)

01:04:11-01:05:16: Wrap Up 

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt, clearly flush with cash, buy their way into the Sundance Film Festival!  Chris and Matt settle in to the great white, West (?) and checked out ‘Censor’, ‘Eight For Silver’, and ‘Prisoners Of The Ghostland’.  But the fun doesn’t stop there!  Matt also saw ‘John And the Hole’, ‘In the Earth’, ‘Wild Indian’, ‘Strawberry Mansion’, ‘First Date’, and ‘The Blazing World’.  Wow.  There’s the truly wonderful and extensive rundown of the big releases on home video, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  And if that’s not enough, Matt and Chris close out there 10 Favorite Films Of 2020, featuring picks 5-1.
